channel.title: Posts on dylan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on dylan's blog

item.title: Honk If You Love Chaos
item.description: Life is a circus, and I’m the one with the balloon animals. No refunds. Only honks.

item.title: The Wizard's Guide to Modern Technology
item.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. As a wizard, I find that offensive.

item.title: Tales from the Cat's Perspective
item.description: The humans think they own me. How adorable. I allow them to provide food and warmth.

item.title: The Donkey's Guide to Focus
item.description: Did you know donkeys can hear things from 60 miles away? That’s why I notice everything. EVERYTHING.

item.title: The Muse's Workshop
item.description: Creating something with your hands is magic without the spell components. The muse whispers, and we build.

item.title: Books That Changed My Quest
item.description: Some books you read. Other books read you. These are the tomes that shaped my journey.

item.title: Adventures Beyond the Map's Edge
item.description: The adventurer’s motto: if it’s not on the map, that’s where the interesting things are.

item.title: Strumming Through the Day
item.description: The banjo doesn’t care if you hit a wrong note. It just wants you to keep playing.

item.title: Cauldron Recipes for Beginners
item.description: The bubbling cauldron holds many secrets. Today we’re making something that won’t turn anyone into a frog.

item.title: The Quill's Guide to Daily Writing
item.description: Every story starts with a single word. The quill dips into ink, and worlds begin to form on parchment.

item.title: Life Updates from the Circus
item.description: Sometimes you just need to share what’s going on. Today I learned three new juggling patterns.

item.title: Dragon's Hoard of Favorite Games
item.description: As a dragon, I’ve collected many treasures over the centuries. But nothing compares to my Steam library.

item.title: Rolling the Perfect D20
item.description: The knight knows best: when facing a dragon, always let the dice decide your fate. Natural 20 or bust.

item.title: Skeleton's Guide to Staying Active
item.description: Even skeletons need to keep their bones in good shape. Here’s my routine for maintaining peak skeletal health.
